articles.title: ECD Automotive Design Announces 1-for-5 Reverse Stock Split
articles.mainIdea: ECD Automotive Design Announces 1-for-5 Reverse Stock Split
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: ECD Automotive Design Announces 1-for-5 Reverse Stock Split. KISSIMMEE, Fla., Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Automotive Design, Inc. (“ECD” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: ECDA), the world’s largest Land Rover and Jaguar restoration company known for its custom luxury builds, including bespoke Defenders, Range Rovers, Jaguar E-Types, Ford Mustangs and Toyota FJs, announced that it will implement a 1-for-5 reverse stock split of its issued and outstanding common stock (“Reverse Stock Split”), effective at market opening time on December 26, 2025. ECD com Related tickers mentioned: ECDA.

articles.title: JOBY to Double U.S. Manufacturing Capacity: Growth Story Heating Up?
articles.mainIdea: JOBY to Double U.S. Manufacturing Capacity: Growth Story Heating Up?
articles.summary: Zacks: JOBY to Double U.S. Manufacturing Capacity: Growth Story Heating Up?. JOBY plans to double U.S. production capacity as demand for electric air taxis and federal support take flight. Related tickers mentioned: ACHR, JOBY, TOYOF.

articles.title: Hino to sell six sales subsidiaries in Japan
articles.mainIdea: Hino to sell six sales subsidiaries in Japan
articles.summary: Just Auto: Hino to sell six sales subsidiaries in Japan. Sales to be completed ahead of merger with Mitsubishi-Fuso. Related tickers mentioned: HINOF.
